string-array.name: data_plot
string-array.item: True Beauty is a high school drama about a girl who becomes a beauty through makeup and faces challenges when her secret is revealed.
Business Proposal tells the story of a woman who participates in a business proposal pretending to be her friend, only to find out the man is her company s CEO
King the Land is about a CEO who tries to open a new hotel and a woman who works there while struggling with her own love story.
Welcome to Samdalri is about a group of individuals who meet in a small village and form bonds through humorous and touching moments.
Love Next Door is a romantic drama revolving around a couple living next door and their developing relationship.
Family by Choice is a heartwarming drama about a group of people who form a family despite not being related by blood.
Lovely Runner follows a runner who is trying to make it in the world of competitive sports while balancing her personal life.
Melo Movie is a romantic comedy about a woman trying to find love while struggling with her career in the film industry.
